channel.title: Right clicking an object in inventory
channel.description:
when i right click an item in my inventory the highlighted part of the rightclick is 3 options down........ Like when you hover your mouse over say.. "wear" Itll be highlighted 3 options down on "drop" ..
Picture: [IMG]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/6467/clientprob1.jpg[/img]
